Subsection.title: Description
Subsection.Paragraph: A theme is an entity responsible for deciding the visual appearance of windows and components. Primarily, themes can be considered to be functions from components to sets of render nodes, although they do have some other responsibilities with regard to window components.

Subsection.title: Window Components
Subsection.Paragraph: Windows come with a set of predefined decoration components. Themes are responsible for deciding, given a set of layout constraints, where each of these components are to be placed within the constraints.
